Title 3: As a requester, I want an online form with required fields so I can submit complete and consistent requests, and as a PMO analyst, I want all submissions stored centrally for tracking.
As a PMO analyst, I want requests automatically categorized, and as a portfolio manager, I want them grouped by department so the evaluation process is easy and structured.
As a requester, I want submission confirmations, and as a PMO team member, I want automated routing so requests reach the correct approvers efficiently.
As a portfolio manager, I want value?based scoring, and as an analyst, I want comparable scores so prioritization decisions are fair and objective.
As a resource manager, I want resource estimates, and as a PMO analyst, I want cost and risk captured to support accurate demand evaluation.
As a strategy team member, I want requests tagged to strategic goals, and as a portfolio manager, I want alignment scores visible to guide decision?making.
As a governance board member, I want a standardized prioritization model, and as a PMO analyst, I want automatically generated ranked lists to support evaluation.
As an approver, I want digital workflows for efficient reviews, and as a requester, I want visibility into my request’s approval status for transparency.
As a portfolio manager, I want dashboards that prepare decision meetings, and as a governance board, I want decisions recorded for future reference and auditing.
As a resource manager, I want a clear view of annual capacity, and as a PMO analyst, I want visibility into bottlenecks to prevent overload.
As a portfolio manager, I want to compare prioritization scenarios, and as an executive, I want to understand trade?offs of approving or delaying requests.
As a PMO team member, I want visual dashboards showing demand versus capacity to support balanced planning.
As a portfolio manager, I want to see the full demand pipeline, and as a PMO analyst, I want to update request statuses throughout their lifecycle.
As a requester, I want automated status updates, and as a leadership member, I want visibility into the reasons for approval or rejection.
As a PMO team, I want regular process review cycles, and as a portfolio manager, I want feedback loops to continually improve scoring and evaluation.
